name: Majong Classic: Chinese Tiles
description:
- COMPETE with Majong lovers all over the world!
- Win the DAILY online competitions!
- Earn all the precious COLLECTION CARDS!

2 GAME MODES
- CLASSIC: the best way to relieve the stress. Keep calm and solve the puzzle!
- BLITZ: daily competition with special layouts. Speed up to come first and get the prize!

TILES
There are a lot of them. Combine and swap in one touch;

LAYOUTS
Choose the one you like and start the game;

BONUSES
Gather the whole card collection to open the locked tiles;

HINTS
Problems? Use several hints to get closer to the win;

SCORES
Gain scores and unlock new levels;

NOSTALGIA
Old-school puzzle for true admirers.
